meanings.definition: A pattern of small, square indentations or raised diamonds on a surface, especially on a firearm or tool handle.
meanings.sent1: The checkering on the gun handle provided a secure grip.
meanings.sent2: The checkering on the tool handle prevented slipping.
meanings.sent3: The checkering on the knife handle made it look like a tiny chessboard.
meanings.sent4: The checkering on the pistol handle gleamed like a constellation of stars.
meanings.sent5: The intricate checkering on the rifle stock was a work of art.

meanings.definition: The act of creating such a pattern on a surface.
meanings.sent1: His checkering of the wood was precise and detailed.
meanings.sent2: The checkering of the metal required skill and patience.
meanings.sent3: She joked that checkering the table was like playing connect-the-dots.
meanings.sent4: The checkering of the leather was like sculpting in miniature.
meanings.sent5: The checkering of the handle was the finishing touch to the craftsmanship.
